Translations.Text: neohuileul changjohasyeossgo neohui seon jodeul-eul changjohan geubun-eul dulyeowo hala
geudeul-i malhagil nega masul-e geollyeo issnola
neoneun uliwa gat-eun han ingan e bulgwahanola ulineun nega geojis maljang-ila midnola
nega jinsil-ilamyeon haneullobuteouliege beol-eul naelige hayeo bola
geuga daedabhagil naui junim kkeseoneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul asigo gyesinila
geudeul-eun geuleul geoyeoghaess-euni eodum-ui nal-ui beol-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaess nola sillo geugeos-eun widaehan nal-ui beol ieossnola
sillo geuan-eneun yejeung-i iss-eu na geudeul daedasuneun midji anihayeoss deola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
sillo igeos-on man-yuui junim eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-ila
mid-eum-ui seonglyeong-i geugeos-eul ga jigo osieo
geudae ma-eum-e naelieo geugeos-eu lo geudaega gyeong-gojaga doedolog hayeoss eumyeo
myeonglyohan alab-eolo gyesihaessnola
geugeos-eun seonjodeul-ui seongseoe seodo eongeub-i doeeossgeoneul
iseula-el jasondeul-ui hagjadeul i geugeos-i sasil-im-eul algo issneun geos man-eulodo yejung-i doeji anhneunyo
man-il hananim-i bialab-in-e ge gyesihayeo
geugeos-eul geudeul-ege nangsonghaessdeo lado geudeul-eun midji anihaess-eulila
ileohge hananim-eun joeindeul-ui ma-eumsog-edo geugeos-i seumyeodeulge haess jiman
gotongseuleoun beol-eul moggyeoghal ttae kkajineun mid-eulyeo haji anh-eul geos-ila
geubeol-eun geudeul-i alji moshaneun saie gabjagi geudeul-ege dolaehani
geudeul-eun malhalila jeohuiga yu ye doel su eobs-eulkkayo
geudeul-eun ajigdo hananim-ui beol-eul jaechoghago issnola
hananim-i geudeullo hayeogeum su nyeongan hyanglag hadolog han geos-eul geudaeneun aneunyo
yagsogdoen beol-i deudieo geudeul-e ge ileuni
